channel.description: Sysinit, Logging, and Tuning Review Questions Q. The systemd command may be used to rebuild a new kernel. True or False? A. False. Q. Which command is used to manage system services? A. The systemctl command. Q. Which configuration file must be modified to ensure journal log entries are stored persistently? A. /etc/systemd/journald.conf Q. What is the PID of the systemd process? A. The PID of the systemd process is 1.
